name: coocoocoocoo
description:
A study of consequence

MUSIC COMPOSED BY ARCHONIC, [link]

LINKS:

  • newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/873988
  • discord: discord.gg/H7UYMWcFUQ
  • github: https://github.com/TrueNarwhak/coocoocoocoo

CONTROLS:

  • arrow keys to move, z to shoot
  • press up to jump, down to fast fall
  • enter to fullscreen, + - to control volume

CREDITS:

  • Full List

INSTALL ISSUES?:

  • If Windows Defender pops up with a window saying "Windows Defender Protected your PC" click More Info > Run anyway
  • If MacOS tells you the game is damaged and should be moved to trash, or that it is unrecognized, you need to switch your settings in Allow apps downloaded from: Anywhere must be selected
